name: Raining cats and dogs (Ache Games (H-Games))
description:
cliché : Raining cats and dogs.

catch as many dogs and cats to earn coins.

You can purchase more catching nets with the coins.

INSTRUCTIONS !!

MOUSE LEFT CLICK to insert catching net.(the catching net will stay for 2.5 seconds or click on the net to remove it)

KEY  A,D  to move the bottom vehicle.

ENTER KEY to pause the game

Level 1 save 10+ cats and dogs

Level 2 save 20+ cats and dogs

Level 3 save 30+ cats and dogs

Level 4 save 40+ cats and dogs

Level 5 save as many cats and dogs for highscore
